entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build failure in RyuJIT for ARM64 #98009
  • MSB4018 The "Microsoft.DotNet.ApiCompat.Task.ValidateAssembliesTask" when building System.Runtime.sln in Visual Studio #98002
  • [browser][mt] Changes broke dotnet build in Http solution #98000
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] `runtime-wasm-perf` not running on PRs anymore #97998
    9.0.0
  • [mono][gc] Objects larger than LOS section size call the LOS heap to grow without bound #97991
  • [Mono] [x64] Add SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector #97988
  • System.Private.CoreLib's "Platform" is always set to AnyCPU when building inside Visual Studio which causes build failures #97984
    9.0.0
  • Build warning when compiling Mono on linux-x64 #97981
    9.0.0
  • DirectoryNotFoundException on Directory.Create #97980
  • Certificate validation with SHA-1 signatures fails when using CheckCertificateRevocationList on RHEL9 #97973
  • [browser][MT] MutexTests.NamedMutex_ThreadExitDisposeRaceTest #97968
    9.0.0
  • .NET8 Crash on use HttpClientHandler.Credentials #97966
  • Reusing the same SocketAsyncEventArgs for different udp remote endpoints does not work anymore #97965
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Reconsider ordering of SSA-based phases #97963
    9.0.0
  • String should still implement IReadOnlyList<char> #97954

Closed

  • superpmi replay jobs are failing #97985
  • Source generator in System.Text.Json does not handle shadowed members correctly #97621
    9.0.0
  • Cannot convert efficiently a System.Numerics.Vector4 to a Vector3 #86220
    Future
  • [wasi] `System.Globalization.Tests` AOT build fails with `LLVM ERROR: out of memory` on Windows #95365
    9.0.0
  • [jitstress] Assertion failed '!"Inconsistent profile data"' #97892
    9.0.0
  • WriteXorExecute is not working in combination with PerfMaps #97765
  • Question: When does `ConcurrentDictionary<TKey, TValue>.TryRemove(TKey, out TValue)` #97993
  • Design limitation: inability to define environment variables *without a value* on Unix-like platforms. #95559
  • [NativeAOT Library] Exceptions thrown from `[UnmanagedFunctionPointer]` delegate can't be caught in `[UnmanagedCallersOnly]` method #97952
  • [wasm] AOT: OOM when compiling `System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.dll` #96866
  • Hitting OOM in LLVM for the wasi-wasm aot smoke tests #96630
  • Performance degradation of the X509Certificate2's private key constructor when running in Linux #97753
  • RyuJIT SIMD: front-end optimizations for SIMD types #6742
    Future
  • Setting\getting a function pointer field with reflection not supported #97830
    9.0.0
  • JS interop should support threading #76956
    9.0.0
  • SizeLimit always discard new items if size is exceeded #97962
  • [Mono] Add basic SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector3 on Arm64 #91456
    9.0.0
  • [QUIC] Port ephemeral key diagnostics on Windows from SslStream #92721
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.ConnectTest.ConnectAsync_CancellationRequestedInflightConnect_ThrowsOperationCanceledException #97092
    9.0.0
  • System.Collections.Generic.ValueListBuilder<T> does not implement Insert method correctly #97928
  • Performance regression: float.ToString(format) 20% to 3x slower #13092
    Future
  • FMA codegen #11260
    Future
  • [Jit] Recognize FMA pattern and Emit Fused Multiply Add (when available) #10137
    Future
  • SIMD tests should include invoking by Reflection #7406
    Future
  • Consider providing SIMD JIT intrinsics for Matrix and Quaternion operations #5630
    Future
  • [Question] `impCloneExpr` vs `fgInsertCommaFormTemp` + `gtCloneExpr` #35314
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-staging] Implement faster RSA key check #98010
    area-System.Security
  • Remove strtok, strtok_s, wcstok_s PAL APIs #98008
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [WIP] Change stack size on 64-bit desktop platforms #98007
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to latest #98006
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix yaml parser error on runtime-wasm-perf.yml #98005
    area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • Suppress unused variable warnings for PERFTRACING_DISABLE CMake vars #98004
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][mt] Extend the blocking Wait test #98003
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Ensure that constant folding for SIMD shifts on xarch follow the correct behavior on overshift #98001
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize TensorPrimitives.Round #97999
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove ref struct pinning from locals #97997
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Build support for linux-bionic-arm / linux-musl-arm #97996
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix TryParseBigIntegerHexOrBinaryNumberStyle #97995
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [CI][browser] Limit parallelism for browser-wasm linux Release LibraryTests_AOT to fix hanging CI #97992
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Ensure that Vector512 uses the same patterns as Vector64/128/256 #97990
    area-System.Numerics
  • Ensure `HashSet.TrimExcess()` does not change the count #97989
    area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • Add missing test case for BitCast #97983
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Make OCSP stapling tests more stable #97979
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [browser][mt] AsyncTransactionScopeTests.VerifyBYOTSyncTSNestedAsync - Value is not null #97977
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix build with Android 26 NDK (which has some nullability annotations) #97976
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Deduplicate LSDA data in the object writer #97972
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] test GC #97970
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [ARM] Use Math[F].Round implementation in managed code #97964
    arch-arm32, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • ObjWriter: Place unboxing section along other TEXT sections #97960
    os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete useless delegate virtual methods #97959
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] More SIMD cleanups #97958
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Implement IList<T> on Enumerable.Cast<T> for IList #97956
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 9.0.0
  • BitCast<TYP_REF>(TypeHandleToRuntimeTypeHandle(clsHandle)) => nongc obj #97955
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use faster write barriers when we know the target address is on the heap #97953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Implement faster RSA key check #97827
    area-System.Security, tenet-performance
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IF_4A` to `SVE_JK_4B` #97739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • STJ: Avoid duplicate initialization of required or init-only properties #97726
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Update build.ps1 #97982
    needs-area-label
  • Add support for Vector<T>.Indices and Vector.CreateSequence #97880
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_FD_3A, IF_SVE_FD_3B, IF_SVE_FD_3C #97934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_F{A,B,C}_3{A,B} #97933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Make Enumerable.First/Last/GetElement faster on various enumerables #97905
    area-System.Linq
  • [RISC-V] Test HalfTest: fixed payload preservation testcase for RISC-V #96888
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Set edge likelihoods during patchpoint transformation #97897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [MT][browser] Fix running in-tree sample apps #97872
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • [browser] Fix `_XHarnessArgs` property name in condition in tests.browser.targets #97971
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add ARM64 encoding for group IF_SVE_CK_2A #97887
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono][reflection] get/set function pointer fields #97909
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Force sourceUrl with a suffix .cdp #97879
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Support more scaled addressing modes on arm64 #97921
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Standardize on using code location for interior asm code references #97853
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update CreateRuntimeRootILLinkDescriptorFile.targets #97974
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Update solution files after projects changes #97969
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use eng/common/native/init-os-and-arch.sh instead of eng/native/init-os-and-arch.sh #97967
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [wasm][debugger] Fixes exception while debugging on Chrome as IDE #97838
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Respect buildflavor in build.ps1 -vs switch #97975
    needs-area-label
  • [browser][MT] dispatch across threads via emscripten #97669
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertprop improvements #97908
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Add basic Vector3 SIMD intrinsics #97416
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Port diagnostic for certs with ephemeral keys on Windows to S.N.Q #97819
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [HTTP] Regenerated ref #97858
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Generalize `optSetPreheaderWeight` #96843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][ws] fix ConnectAsync_CancellationRequestedInflightConnect_ThrowsOperationCanceledException #97868
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix assert in ValueListBuilder.Insert #97957
    area-System.Collections
  • [RISC-V] Implement replacing safe-point call instructions under GC_STRESS #97818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

Updated

  • Add encoding for ARM64 IF_SVE_CJ_2A instruction group #97885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Expose AVX512F embedded rounding intrinsics. #97415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fast field access #97784
    area-System.Reflection
  • Mark most specific static DIM for types marked RelevantToVariantCasting #97487
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Late cast expansion: remove the null check if possible #97234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Small SIMD cleanups #97918
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Remove more llvm restrictions. #97907
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Remove an llvm restriction which is not needed anymore. #97862
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Place vtable slots deemed final by analysis into sealed vtable #97951
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add implementations for MakePointerType(), MakeArrayType() for GenericTypeParameterBuilder #97350
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Add Sve.IsSupported support #97814
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add API call for Arm64 Sve.LoadVectorNonFaulting #97695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Add scalar evolution analysis and do IV widening based on it #97865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix NRE with UnicodeEncoding when target is an empty span #97950
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Fix building on ARMhf userland on top of AARCH64 kernel #97929
    arch-arm32, os-linux, area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix regex lazy loop handling of backtracking state at max iteration limit #97927
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.x
  • Ported interleaving support to System.IO.Packaging #97898
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for linux/arm64 #97910
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Remove built-in COM interop support from Mono runtime #97789
    area-Interop-mono
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Unify formatting part of BigInteger of CoreLib #97889
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse(powerOfTen) #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT][8.0] Use ld_classic in ILC build and in build integration #97856
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • Make some Span methods NonVersionable #94258
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix possible runaway mutex in ManagedWebSocket.ReceiveAsyncPrivate() #97911
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Fixes exception while debugging on Chrome as IDE #97871
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Force sourceUrl with a suffix .cdp #97702
    NO-MERGE, Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, os-browser, 8.0.3
  • Sanitize Reg Entries in SerialPort.GetPortNames (Issue 93240) #93242
    no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, area-System.IO.Ports
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #95859
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Avoid allocating HashSet in Distinct() for some counts #97845
    area-System.Linq
  • [mono][aot] Allow valuetype sharing for more sizes. #97860
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • CallSiteValidator doesn't cache results of the walk #96254
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] change the branch's disasm-format. #96229
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [RISC-V] Skip ComputeReturnFlags in ArgIteratorTemplate::HasRetBuffArg #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix interpreter #97935
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add separate properties for keep-in-sync versions #97643
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement fast shadow tail calls #2213

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Efficient shadow stack allocation #2294

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add SwiftBindings experiment #2508
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CopyToOutputDirectory doesn't work inside Target #38546
  • [Question]Prompt permission denied after update to 8.0 #38541
  • add more detail to dotnet --info #38532

Closed

  • Ignore failed sources config #38519

PullRequests

Created

  • Move SB metadata to intermediates #38545
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38544
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't use Roslyn toolset package for APICompat validation on desktop msbuild < 17.9.0 #38543
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat

Merged

  • Don't attempt to run APICompat in design time builds #38542
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Remove unused StringWriter from GenerateToolSettingsFile Task #38378
    untriaged, Area-Tools

Updated

  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update to Unified Build controls #38506
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [`dotnet list package`]Resolve relative paths #38306
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #37501] Verbosity Options default to `minimal` from `quiet` in `tool install` #38277
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • NET tool roll forward error experience #38210
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • filter references for satellite assembly generation down to just the primary assemblies #38504
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Use runtime packs for NativeAOT on .NET 9.0 or higher #37872
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Collection Expressions Next (C#13 and beyond) #7913

PullRequests

Created

  • ref struct interfaces updates #7911

Merged

  • Reserve slot for non-enumerable collection types #7915
  • Update README.md #7912
  • Add implementation specific docs #7899
  • ref struct working group notes #6691

Updated

  • Determine element type for write-only CollectionBuilder collection types #7895
  • Add proposal for overload resolution priority #7906

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71961
  • Incomplete switch expression with a "case" makes Visual Studio report over ~40+ warnings #71957

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify compilation tracking (part3) #71966
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make constructor with additional argument private #71965
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify compilation tracking (part 2) #71964
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify compilation tracking #71963
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix invariant-breaking parsing of errant case clauses in switch expressions #71960
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Definition items #71959
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Option type renames #71958
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Report better warnings and errors if build hosts exit abnormally #71909
    Area-IDE, Next
  • PR feedback in object serialization. #71935
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add publishing configuration for vscode net8 branch #71962
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Adjust public API based on API review feedback #71940
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections

Updated

  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Set NetRoslyn value for VMR build #71704
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use `/generatedfilesout` in generated SyntaxTree.FilePath #71879
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Refactors LSP server extension assembly loading #71862
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Avoid visiting reachable local functions with default state #71679
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Improve use of SyntaxContext in snippet and method/type import completion providers #71872
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Work on `ctor` snippet after modifiers #71869
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Restored the reverted XAML PR (Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170) #71758
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fail tests if errors are reported #71893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disallow ref kind mismatch for dynamic arguments in non-ComImport scenarios. #71923
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Lookup in extended type (simple name and member access) #71779
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Prevent error propagations by misplaced semicolon in list parsing #71712
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • [VB] Improve casting from floating-point or decimal types to integer types in more cases #71838
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix line endings of semantic snippets #71731
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Handle Lock type in VB #71927
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Align `params` type validation with the the spec #71918
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections
  • Update taggers to cooperate with each other for accessing the UI thread. #68381
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SpaServices.Extensions is Proxying Mapped Routes to SPA Dev Server #53825
  • Can't sent byte[] from the client to the SignalR hub #53824
  • Perf regression: single_query, single_query #53823
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #53822
  • [Blazor] Public API changes to enable compression on Interactive components for Blazor Web #53821
  • HttpContext dispose diagnostics don't get processed (not always) #53820
  • Certain protocols trigger disconnect in Blazor #53815
  • How to generate OpenApi-docs with required body parameter? #53813
  • Blazor Web interactive Server Editor throws error #53812
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, updates #53811

Closed

  • Enable compression on blazorpack #35897
    9.0-preview2
  • Perf improvement: https, mvc, plainTextWithFilter #53614
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, plaintext #53805
  • Perf regression: json #53807

PullRequests

Created

  • Add unit test to confirm change token is disposed during #53827
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Prevent error boundaries from handling exceptions of type `NavigationException` #53826
    area-blazor
  • Makes RemoteAuthenticationContext serialize correctly #53819
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • [Blazor] Enable websocket compression for Blazor Server and Interactive Server components in Blazor web #53389
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview2

Updated

  • Fix casing of ProblemDetails for RFC compliance #53792
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks, 8.0.x
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • http.sys: Allow configuring HTTP_AUTH_EX_FLAGs as options #51833
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] Fix stale values from `[SupplyParameterFromQuery]` #53625
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • [Blazor] Fixes encoded `/` on Blazor Router #53538
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Where can I find `dotnet-sos` or `libsos.so` for `linux-s390x` and `linux-ppc64le`? #4494
    9.0.0
  • `dotnet-trace` speedscope report: the call of one method is divided into different pieces #4490
    9.0.0
  • CLRMD floods logs with `EnumerateStackRoots found an entry with Object == 0, addr:73664ff040 srcType:0` while enumerating root paths for core dump created under linux #4484
    9.0.0
  • dotnet-symbol can't download symbols for dotnet 7.0.15 #4481
    9.0.0
  • Can't analyze dump of arm64ec process #4430
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix dotnet-trace rundown default #4499

Merged

  • Fix dotnet-trace rundown default #4498

Updated

  • feat: dumphttp command initial implementation #4488

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Problem: Unable to enable Hyper-V in my laptop with x64 #20373
  • HTML Label not applying Bold or Italics on iOS #20372
  • MAUI Navigation Bug in ToastNotificationManagerCompat.OnActivated #20370
  • .Net 8 Android App crashes only in release on physical device #20369
  • Searchhandler dissapears or does not appear at all #20367
  • Xamarin.UITest “iOSDeviceManager” will damage your computer. You should move it to the Bin #20364
  • [Android] Modal shown TabbedPage has problems with SetSoftInputMode AdjustResize #20358
    Backlog
  • CarouselView Snaps Back to First Page When Entry with Center or End HorizontalTextAlignment is Focused #20357
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps for Windows #20356
    Backlog
  • MAUI maps in .net 8 causes error on IOS CAMetalLayer ignoring invalid setDrawableSize width=0.000000 height=0.000000 #20355

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx-sr2' into `main` #20371
  • [iOS] Fixed RadioButton text related properties not working #20366
    community ✨
  • Add the multi-project template #20365
  • [net8.0] Update with main #20363
  • [net9.0] Update with main #20362

Merged

  • [release/9.0.1xx preview1] Update with preview1 changes #20321
  • Account for margins on sizes returned from Editor #20249
    area/controls 🎮, control-editor

Updated

  • If the current thread dispatcher is null return the app level dispatcher #20313
    .NET 8 SR2

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Make all SQL expression nodes quotable #33008
    9.0.0
  • Ignored/Removed Indexes are still created in GenerateCreateScript #33007
  • Add configuration files for dotnet ef #33005
  • Unfulfillable nullable contraints are set for complex types with TPH entities #33004
  • Expose StateManager.TryGetEntry in DbContext.ChangeTracker #33003

Closed

  • .net 6 to .net 8, several foreigns keys will be removed and recreate in a migration #32962
  • Concurrency Detector loses lock when multiple contexts are used in a thread. #31890
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Stop throwing eagerly when looking up a ValueGenerator #32930

Updated

  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #32721

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-05
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • DownloadFile failing repeatedly on Darwin_Build_Release_x64 despite the file being there #17588
  • Unified Build control update #14418

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove NetRoslyn patch #18513
  • Fix CROSSCOMPILE being set for non-cross Mono builds #18512

Merged

  • Move SB metadata to intermediates #18511
  • Separate out the test exclusions that apply to stable SDKs #18423
  • Bootstrap SB SDK and artifacts #18504

Updated

  • Add VMR unified build pipelines #18409
  • Support for short stack builds. #18463
  • Add FreeBSD x64 and ARM64 RIDs #18493
  • Update SdkResolver layout to work for Desktop and Core MSBuild #18505
